name: Zomoby: Zombie Monsters Arena (ildarin)
description:
This game was released in 2018. It is available in Google Play for free. I supposed to build PC version, but, may be, I will do it later. Because of project adapted for any screen and platform - the game can be released for Mac, Linux or any another platform, that Unity supports. 

Zomoby: Zombie Monsters Arena is a indie retro pixel roguelike action game with crowds of a zombies, monsters, demons and other creatures. All objects in game are destructible! You can use environment as a weapon, think wisely! A lot of different weapons will help you. Upgrade your character, freeze, explode and dissolve in acid all enemies to win.

Fully destractable enviroment, bullet hell and explosive fun - there are many ways to kill your enemies!

Collect coins and improvements from opponents. Spend coins on new features and reinforcements, become stronger with each passing, and a large assortment of improvements will not get bored!

A variety of enemies have their own characteristics: dumb zombies are ahead, and cunning warlocks are hiding behind the backs of creatures called from hell. Demons and skeletons prefer to attack from afar. Find your approach for every enemy!

25 various levels: you will have time to fight both in summer and in winter, and on the surface, and in deep dark caves, where the human foot has not trod. Procedural generation will not let you get used: every time like a new one!

It's easy to start and hard to win! There will be no training, preparations and a boring text - immediately into battle! Non stop dynamic fights - that's what a real fighter with evil spirits!

Pleasant old school graphics in the style of pixel art, wind-up music and soft game sound will complement the various levels.
